Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 137th overall pick, by New York in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Celso Cortes (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/2019, off Henry Williams (LA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2019, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2020, hitting .368 with 9 HR, 20 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/6/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $7,270,000 per year...
Hit for the cycle against Baltimore on 5/16/2021...
